Exploring the following features to upgrade your listening experience.

-Sleep timer up to 2 hours or after a selected amount of chapters.


We can't wait to meet you! Come and explore this fantasy world with us!

Welcome to Wehear, we present you with a wealth of audio novels anytime and anywhere. Start your listening journey and we will be there as your companion.


About Wehear

-Contains various of popular audiobook genres including Romance, Fantasy, Paranormal, Classics, etc.
-A large amount of exclusive books presented only by Wehear.
-Professional narrators, High-quality recording, creating an immersive experience for you.


Exploring the following features to upgrade your listening experience.

-Multiple free samples, all starts at a simple choice.
-Playback speed control.
-Available for offline download, listen whenever and wherever you want.
-Smooth experience of high-quality and ad-free audiobooks.
-Jump foward/back or playback/rewind.
-Automatic sync data between devices. Fluency of playing.
-Sleep timer up to 2 hours or after a selected amount of chapters.


We can't wait to meet you! Come and explore this fantasy world with us!

creator: Joy Reading Culture Media Co Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Wehear, the audiobook paradise for females!
With a feast of audio fiction specially catering for females of all ages, Wehear brings you to a fantastic world filled with romance and surprises! Download Wehear and explore your favorite audiobook romance!

[Addictive Audiobooks]
❤Large in Number: explore an abundance of audio romances in Wehear
❤Diversified in Genre: romance, werewolf/vampire, YA/teenfiction, fantasy, suspense, etc.

[High-quality Recording]
❤Professional Narrators: every Wehear story is presented by experienced narrators
❤Background Music: affective voices with touching music immerse you in the story

[User-friendly Design]
❤Ad-free: kick off a fantastic journey without the disturbance of ads
❤Free Episodes: available for you to pick out your favorites
❤Customizable Player: adjustable sleep timer and narration speed

We can't wait to meet you! Come and explore this fantastic world with us!
descriptionShort: Wehear - Best Audio Stories for Females

descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Wehear, we present you with a wealth of audio novels anytime and anywhere. Start your listening journey and we will be there as your companion.


About Wehear

-Contains various of popular audiobook genres including Romance, Fantasy, Paranormal, Classics, etc.
-A large amount of exclusive books presented only by Wehear.
-Professional narrators, High-quality recording, creating an immersive experience for you.


Exploring the following features to upgrade your listening experience.

-Multiple samples, all starts at a simple choice.
-Playback speed control.
-Available for offline download, listen whenever and wherever you want.
-Smooth experience of high-quality and ad-free audiobooks.
-Jump foward/back or playback/rewind.
-Automatic sync data between devices. Fluency of playing.
-Sleep timer up to 2 hours or after a selected amount of chapters.


We can't wait to meet you! Come and explore this fantasy world with us!

Rider Blakely was the one werewolf who hated humans the most. Discovering that Vera was his mate was his worst nightmare. What neither of them know is that Vera is no regular human. Listen on Wehear to find out how Vera is going to change the world.

container.value: SUITE 3101 EVERBRIGHT CTR 108 GLOUCESTER RD WANCHAI HONG KONG

creator: STAR READING LIMITED
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Wehear, we present you with a wealth of audio novels anytime and anywhere. Start your listening journey and we will be there as your companion.

【About Wehear】
-Various of popular audiobook genres including Romance, Fantasy, Paranormal, Classics, etc.
-A large amount of exclusive books presented only by Wehear.

【The Human in the Wolf Pack】
This story isn't about the werewolf who found his mate, but a human. Vera White was raised by werewolves, and grew up hated by their kind. She despised the existence of mates. Little did she know, she would have one of her own.

Rider Blakely was the one werewolf who hated humans the most. Discovering that Vera was his mate was his worst nightmare. What neither of them know is that Vera is no regular human. Listen on Wehear to find out how Vera is going to change the world.

【Upgrading listening experience】
-Professional narrators, High-quality recording, creating an immersive experience for you.
-Multiple samples, all starts at a simple choice.
-Playback speed control.
-Available for offline download, listen whenever and wherever you want.
-Smooth experience of high-quality and ad-free audiobooks.
-Jump forward/back or playback/rewind.
-Automatic sync data between devices. Fluency of playing.
-Sleep timer up to 2 hours or after a selected amount of chapters.

【Narrator Application】
Let’s build a fantastic audible world with your good voice!
What to expect as a Wehear narrator:
Generous financial incentives
Personal channel on Wehear
Supported by millions of worldwide users
Flexible working hours
Please summit your demo&resume to voices@wehearfm.com

container.value: SUITE 3101 EVERBRIGHT CTR 108 GLOUCESTER RD WANCHAI HONG KONG

creator: STAR READING LIMITED
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Wehear, the audible wolrd with all kinds of stories you can imagine.
Romance, erotic, werewolf, adventure, horror, all love, paranormal, etc..

Dive into audible stories anytime, anywhere
Looking for addictive werewolf, romance, love, horror and fantasy audiobooks as a driving alone broadcast? Or bedtime story? Also while your baby is sleeping? Wehear is your right choice.
Just dive in.

Remember, it's audible, so you can enjoy without your hands and eyes. Let Wehear become your good friend and best storyteller.

Dr.Luna
Dr.Luna, known as The Doctor Series, are some of the MUST PLAY audiobooks on Wehear.
"She was different. Everything changed one day when she heard the word MATE..."
"As she climbed into bed, she felt the bed dip down beside her and she turned with shocked eyes to Tyler laying down beside her..."

More trending audiobooks in Wehear
Once Rejected, Twice Desired (Blue Moon Series)
Prince Reagan
The Unloved Mate
Scared and Rejected
Her Alpha Mate
Gravity
Alpha Prince's Bride Series
The Alpha's Cinderella
Abused and Broken
Rejected and Forsaken
The Alpha's Abused Mate
Can I Unreject My Rejection
Once Upon a One-night-stand
HIS
Outcast: Daughter of The Moon Children of the Sun
His Unsuspecting Mate
The Alpha's Choice
My Boss Is My Son's Dad

Upgrading wehear experience
- Professional narrators, High-quality recording, creating an immersive audible world for you.
- High quality audiobook collections, recommended by editors.
